'''House Rykker''' is a [[Noble house|vassal house]] sworn to [[House Baratheon of King's Landing]]. Their seat is the town of [[Duskendale]], located in [[The Crownlands|the Crownlands]]. It holds fealty directly to the [[Iron Throne]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Rykker was raised to lordship over Duskendale after the purge of House Darklyn, following the Defiance of Duskendale. Renfred Rykker, Lord of Duskendale, rules over Duskendale from the Dun Fort, a castle overlooking Duskendale. Their sigil is two black warhammers crossed on a white saltire on blue.
sections.Members: * Ser [[Jaremy Rykker]], acting [[First Ranger]] of the [[Night's Watch]].
